A relatively untouched jewel in the Gulf of Thailand, the island of Koh Samui promises sparkling waters, delicious cuisine, and plenty of down time amid swaying palms. Venture to the ultra-private Baan Taling Ngam beach to explore a coral reef or simply absorb some rays. Or indulge in a Thai Herbal Compress Massage at one of the island's renowned spa resorts. Whatever your pleasure, you can enjoy it together in this idyllic Asian getaway. http://media.expedia.com/media/content/expus/graphics/promos/deals/tripfinder/romance/romance_kohsamui.pngv

row.description: Experience Canadian coastal living at its best in Victoria, a seaside city that offers myriad opportunities for sailing, fishing, kayaking, and whale-watching. Amble through the immaculate grounds of the Butchart Gardens, a 55-acre garden that's home to blooming flora year-round. Stroll Victoria's historical harbor and explore its vibrant downtown. However you choose to relax, you'll do it in comfort: Victoria has the mildest climate in Canada.

Of the 332 islands that comprise the nation of Fiji, only 110 are inhabited. The country has a wealth of unspoiled tropical beaches, reefs, and islets. Island-hop in the exceptional Yasawa Group, a 12-island archipelago that's home to budget digs (i.e. thatched huts) and premier resorts (i.e. private cabanas with air conditioning and butler service). The islands are also have their share of adults-only resorts, all the better for a party of two.

Acapulco's mix of high-end resorts and budget lodging make it an excellent choice for romantics from any tax bracket. Rekindle the fire at Las Brisas, with hilltop casitas, private plunge pools, and beachfront dining. Walk the shores of Acapulco Bay at sunset before ordering the fresh lobster at one of the city's finest restaurants. For a more affordable yet equally romantic getaway, hit up the oceanfront grills and palapas to the north of town.

Savannah, Georgia's classic Southern architecture, leafy boulevards, and cobblestone parks provide lucky visitors with an endlessly charming romantic backdrop. Stroll through meticulously maintained gardens in the city's Landmark Historical District. Explore galleries overflowing with the work of talented local artists, and dine at fine establishments where the waiter quickly becomes your new best friend. Savannah is a city to fall in love with.

Famous for streetcars, fine cuisine, and charming boutique hotels, San Francisco is the romantic getaway of choice for those in love with beautiful cities. Experience the beauty of the Bay at Golden Gate Park. Explore crooked Lombard Street or North Beach cafes where poets moved their generations. Start the evening together by taking in the sunset from Twin Peaks or Coit Tower on Telegraph Hill. Let the City by the Bay take your breath away.

row.site: Lush tropical rainforest and botanical gardens.
row.description: Fall in love with - and in - one of Hawaii's most treasured gems, Kauai. The island's bountiful natural beauty is balanced perfectly with amenities for discerning luxury travelers. Start the day with a hike to a private waterfall cascading into a sparkling pool. Explore gardens where flowers bloom like fireworks and native fruits sweetly beckon. At the end of the day, leave two sets of footprints on the beach as the sun dips beneath the horizon.

row.site: Snuggle up on whale watching tours.
row.description: Those who wish to experience the richness of Hawaiian culture head straight for Maui. Hikes, sunset walks, and day trips to the island's volcanic wonders await couples passionate for adventure. Enjoy the vibrant marine life on a whale-watching tour or sample the best pineapple and guava you'll ever taste at an authentic luau. If you're in the mood for entertainment, don't miss the fire, passion, and music of a traditional hula show.

row.site: Dinner, sights from atop the Space Needle.
row.description: From the iconic Space Needle where diners marvel at mountain views, to the galleries and shops of historical Pioneer Square, Seattle, Washington welcomes visitors with an array of romantic enclaves. Take a sunset cruise on Elliott Bay or stroll among flowers and fruit at Pike Place Market. Whether you explore museums, fine dining, entertainment, or all the above, your visit to Seattle promises to be sleepless and memorable.

row.site: Wine tasting at local vineyards, fine dining, spa.
row.description: When you arrive in Charleston, South Carolina, you step into a romantic era of courtship and courtesy. The city's meticulously preserved architecture and cobblestone streets make a charming setting for a romantic getaway. You'll also enjoy the latest modern amenities at sumptuously appointed hotels where you'll be greeted with that famous southern hospitality. These are just a few reasons why the city was named "Most Romantic" by Bridal Magazine.

row.site: Guided River Cruise on the Napa River.
row.description: Wine is only the beginning of a romantic getaway to Napa Valley. Enjoy a guided cruise on the Napa River, where local personalities help you spot wildlife along the banks while you enjoy a bottle of vino. Pack up your picnic and wind through the countryside by bicycle. With an abundance of spas, some of the finest dining this side of paradise, and gorgeous scenery, Napa Valley is a place where love blooms among the vines.

row.site: Guided River Cruise on the Napa River.
row.description: What's not to love about New York? The city of Woody Allen's romantic comedies, world-famous parks, and dining to die for makes romance not only possible, but inevitable. Start with a carriage ride around Central Park and stop off at any of the astounding museums that ring its perimeter. Bop along in a jazz club or experience the grandeur of the latest operatic masterpiece. Don't just enjoy a night out on the town, enjoy a night out on the town.

row.site: St. Augustine is the nations oldest city filled with historic architecture.
row.description: Explore the romance and beauty of America's oldest city, St. Augustine, Florida. Here you can tour the historical architecture from the comfort of trains, trolleys, or a horse-drawn carriage. Indulge in some retail therapy among many fine arts and crafts shops and savor an intimate fine dining experience. Conquistadors believed this to be the site of the Fountain of Youth, and after your refreshing visit, you may be inclined to agree.

row.site: St. Croix is the largest of the United States Virgin Islands.
row.description: A typical romantic night out for natives of the U.S. Virgin Islands includes a moon-lit walk on the beach, a dinner of seafood caught just that afternoon, and cocktails quaffed to the beat of Calypso drummers. Why not go local? Explore secluded St. John, two-thirds of which is a lush national park. Stroll among the mills and sugarcane plantations of St. Croix. Or take a day trip by ferry to St. Thomas's pristine beaches. You won't want to leave...

row.site: Museums Museum of Fine Arts, Science Museum, Aquarium, Childrens Museum.
row.description: Book a spa treatment and give your body a much-needed rest from Whistler's nonstop skiing, hiking, biking, and golfing. This mega-resort town boasts more than 20 spas offering everything from Moor Mud wraps to Ayurvedic facials. Treat your toes to a pedicure while a stylist works magic on your hair. And gentlemen, listen up. Many spas in Whistler offer special rates for couples, making a shiatsu massage for two the perfect surprise gift.

row.site: Museum of Fine Arts, Science Museum, Aquarium, Childrens Museum.
row.description: While many travelers flock to Banff and Lake Louise for the multitude of outdoor activities, a growing number of visitors love the area for its spas, salons, and hot springs. Indulge yourself with a Vichy hydrotherapy treatment or a full body Swedish massage session. Or take the whole family to one of Banff's hot springs complexes, both of which have thermal pools, swimming pools, cafes, and children's play areas.

row.site: Museum of Fine Arts, Science Museum, Aquarium, Childrens Museum.
row.description: The Bahamas are home to some of the world's most exclusive spas, including the five-star One & Only Ocean Club, where you can enjoy a heated seaweed mask followed by a massage. Book a stay for two at the Sandals Royal Bahamian Resort & Spa, a couples-only escape with eucalyptus steam baths and hot and cold plunge pools. You'll find pampering the top priority at every resort on this tropical isle.

row.site: Museum of Fine Arts, Science Museum, Aquarium, Childrens Museum.
row.description: Thanks to boutique resorts like the Sivory Punta Cana - a beachfront enclave with Balinese suites and three top-tier restaurants - the Dominican Republic is quickly becoming known as a luxury destination. Enjoy a beachfront shiatsu massage at an all-inclusive resort and spa, or book a hot volcanic stone massage at Puerto Plata's new Maxim Bungalow, which also offers caviar facials. Luxury is no stranger to this island paradise.

row.site: Museums (Museum of Fine Arts, Science Museum, Aquarium, Childrens Museum).
row.description: St. Lucia is an island of sublime luxury resorts. Lounge beside your cabana and private infinity pool at Jade Mountain resort, which overlooks the Pitons and the Caribbean. Unwind in the luxurious isolation of Anse Chastanet, a 600-acre resort with private cabanas and a beachfront spa offering Swedish massage and aromatherapy. Whether you prefer air conditioning or fresh air, St. Lucia has a luxurious retreat for you.

row.site: Museums (Museum of Fine Arts, Science Museum, Aquarium, Childrens Museum).
row.description: Jamaica is resplendent with a variety of high-end spas and resorts, including Goldeneye, the 18-acre luxury resort that was once the estate of James Bond author Ian Fleming. Discover the remarkable Caves resort, an oceanfront escape with sea caves, grottos, and ten private cottages. Or treat your family to hot stone massages, Frette linens, and butler service at the Ritz Carlton Rose Hall, a five-star resort set on 5,000 acres.

row.site: Museums (Museum of Fine Arts, Science Museum, Aquarium, Childrens Museum).
row.description: Cancun's resorts and spas rank among the finest in the world. Proof: the JW Marriott Cancun was rated one of the world's top 50 resort spas by Conde Nast. Immerse yourself in a cascading waterfall massage at Le Meridien Cancun, a French-themed spa with private pools and Swiss showers. Traveling as a twosome? Treat your significant other to a private outdoor massage suite at the Le Blanc Spa, where shiatsu, Thai, and Swedish massage experts await.

row.site: Museums (Museum of Fine Arts, Science Museum, Aquarium, Childrens Museum).
row.description: Slip away to Los Cabos, home of Mexico's most posh spas and hotels. Splurge on an algae body wrap at Las Ventanas Al Paraiso, Cabo's most luxurious retreat. Receive an innovative wine- and grape-infused skin treatment at the SOMMA Wine Spa. And stay in boutique heaven at the Casa del Mar beach resort, home to a silent sunbathing area and nightly holistic meditation rituals around a beach fire. When luxury calls, Los Cabos answers.

row.site: Museums (Museum of Fine Arts, Science Museum, Aquarium, Childrens Museum).
row.description: The Pacific coastline north of Puerto Vallarta is home to a wealth of upscale resorts - so many, in fact, that it's known as the "Mexican Riviera." Revel in an exfoliating chamomile body scrub at the Apuane Spa, located in the Four Seasons Punta Mita. Or relax beside the sprawling pool complex at Grand Velas, a five-star resort with an on-site spa that offers a hot and cold lagoon, Swiss showers, and a full massage menu.

row.site: Museums (Museum of Fine Arts, Science Museum, Aquarium, Childrens Museum).
row.description: Barbados is a heavenly getaway for romantics, single travelers, and families alike. Bring your clubs to Sandy Lane Resort, where the golf courses and spa are equally renowned. Relax with the family beside the expansive, multi-tiered pool complex at the historical Crane Resort, built in 1887. But bring only your spouse to The House, a four-star, adults-only resort where each couple is assigned a personal ambassador.

row.site: Best resort spas in the country.
row.description: Some of the finest spa resorts in the country lie within reach of Phoenix, Arizona. These desert oases among cacti and magnificent rock formations offer services inspired by the natural elements. Take your pick from the endless variety of treatments, from Asian-inspired to Swedish to stress-eliminating hot stone massages. What could possibly add to the experience? World-class shopping and some of the finest cuisine in the Southwest.

row.site: Las Vegas features more than 30 spa facilities.
row.description: Step away from the energy of the gaming floor at many of Las Vegas's most popular casinos and you'll find a wealth of comforting spa getaways. With more than 30 facilities to choose from, you can explore a wide variety of treatments, from Shiatsu and Swedish massages to aromatherapy, herbal wraps, and reflexology. Having a girls' getaway? Sign up for manicures, pedicures, and facials. Or simply relax in a sauna and let your cares drift away.

row.site: Swedish, Native American, and European Methods are used.
row.description: Santa Fe, New Mexico draws visitors passionate about the healing arts. Experience treatments inspired by Native American, Japanese, and European methods in several specialized spas. Your adventure into renewal and rejuvenation can include explorations into Chinese medicine, modern shamanism, astrology, hypnosis, or just tried-and-true Swedish massage. Best of all, you'll enjoy your spa experience in a city filled with art and natural beauty.

row.site: A concentration of them in Waikiki
row.description: Ancient Hawaiians believed in lokahi, the idea that all living things are connected. This spirit suffuses the many spa resorts concentrated in Waikiki. Find your center in a yoga or tai chi session on the beach or a lush, tropical garden. Bathe in the kawehewehe, or "healing waters" of Gray's Beach. And don't forget there's nothing quite as refreshing as a walk on one of Oahu's legendary shorelines at sunrise or sunset.

When you partake in an outdoor spa treatment in the calming breezes of Kauai, you're participating in ancient Hawaiian healing practices. Here you'll find deep calm on the beach or beside the sacred Wailua River. You'll experience Lomi Lomi massage, based on the Polynesian idea of huna, meaning "everything seeks love." Beginning with a traditional Hawaiian blessing, this treatment is just the first step in your peaceful journey.

Palm Springs is the traditional getaway for Hollywood celebs seeking a quiet place to refocus their creative energies. Rediscover your own inner peace with hydrotherapy or enjoy an abundance of skin treatments designed to keep you beautiful. Take refuge in a boutique resort spa, or bring your friends along to one of the area's hip and swanky day spas. After a day of pampering, delicious food, and deep relaxation, you'll feel like a movie star.

Among spa aficionados, Palm Beach is known to have "the best of everything." A variety of full-service facilities employ some of the most talented practitioners of European massage techniques you're likely to find. Refocus in spas rated in the top ten by Zagat. Slip into the "Waters of the World," a series of outdoor pools infused with salts and minerals imported from the Dead Sea and French Pyrenees. Afterward, world-class golf and dining await.

row.site: The Four Seasons Resort, Biltmore Hotel
row.description: Seaside luxury beckons travelers to Santa Barbara, California. Enjoy some of the highest of high-end resorts as well as bargains on treatments at rejuvenating day spas. Embark on a wine-tasting tour arranged by your concierge or relax after a day on the golf course with a shiatsu massage. Or simply breathe the salty breeze along some of the area's most beguiling coastline. Santa Barbara provides pleasure in its many forms.

Those seeking the fulfillment of a healing spa experience need look no further than Dallas, Texas. Luxuriate in mud and salt treatments, herbal wraps, and aromatherapy massage at four- and five-star resorts. Start your day with pilates, yoga, or tai chi, then break for a healthy spa cuisine lunch. Traveling with a friend? Try side by side shiatsu massage. And if golf's your game, you'll find the city's sculpted courses world-class.

Discover intimate spas and stunningly beautiful resorts in sun-blessed Naples, Florida. It's a calming place to try new and wondrous methods of relaxation. How about a honeysuckle scrub or frangipani wrap? Let serenity be your guide as you work on the perfect Florida tan or hydrate your skin with a fresh sugarcane treatment. Once you're reinvigorated, hit the courts for some tennis or inhale gentle ocean breezes on a secluded stretch of beach.
